name: 1Bit Dungeon
description:
Roguelike game for Nokia 3310 jam

Explore the depths of a 1-bit dungeon, collect food and first-aid kits, fight ferocious monsters

Controls:

  • WASD + Space, Tab
  • Arrow + Enter, Tab
  • Numpad: 8, 4, 5, 6 + Enter, *
  • WASD - move and attack
  • Space (#) - select
  • Tab - mini map

Try to go as deep as possible, kill more monsters and get more experience! Good luck!
